citeinfo.origin: Gerald A. Sanger, Northwest Fisheries Center, National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Seattle, Washington 98112
citeinfo.title: Pelagic Records of Glaucous-winged and Herring Gulls in the North Pacific Ocean

abstract.p: [Reference: Sanger, G. A. 1973. Pelagic records of glaucous-winged and herring gulls in the North Pacific Ocean. Auk 90:384-393.] Reprint available at the NOAA Seattle NMML Library.

descript.purpose: To create a pelagic records of Glaucous-winged and herring gulls in the North Pacific ocean
